1.content: What do you do with such power?
1.title: Lets Begin

15.content: you head home... who is there
15.title: Nothing (For Now)

151.content:
You enter your home. You are a 16 year old boy, pretty average looking, your a bit nerdy but definitely play sports and are in relatively good shape.

“Hi sweetie,” you hear from the kitchen. You turn to see your mom who is making dinner. She was a standard house wife with a typical feminine personality. She had a love for crappy romance novels, beautiful clothes, cooking and watching reality tv.

She was the very definition of the word milf. She had round H-cup tits that had barely begun to sag, thin hourglass figure, wide hips, a plump round ass and a beautiful face.

“Hello,” you reply.

“How was school?” she asked.

“School was fine,” you say “nothing really interesting happened.”

“Oh, that’s a shame, well dinner will be ready at 6 ok.”

“Ok.” You look at her and start to get curious. You had recently gained the power to swap anything with anyone with just a thought so long as you were able to see them. Looking at your mom you decided to swap.......
151.title: Your Mom (47 Years old)

info.brief_description: You get the power to swap anything about you with anything from any person or character!
info.description: You get the power to swap anything about you with anything from any person or character!
